channel.title: How do you make a tele portal?

:)need help with a simple thing,
How do you make a tele portal? Need a TUT. Thank-You.

item.title: How do you make a tele portal?
item.dc:creator: @kiaz kiaz
item.description:
@kiaz wrote:

here is my portal code

	public int portalTimer = 60;
	public void portal(){
					for(int inRange = 0; inRange < PlayerHandler.maxPlayers; inRange++) {
				if(PlayerHandler.players[inRange] != null && PlayerHandler.players[inRange].IsDead == false){
					if(PlayerHandler.players[inRange].absY >= 3422 && PlayerHandler.players[inRange].absY <= 3424 && PlayerHandler.players[inRange].absX >= 3263 && PlayerHandler.players[inRange].absX <= 3265){
						PlayerHandler.players[inRange].teleportToX = 3700;
						PlayerHandler.players[inRange].teleportToY = 3265;
					}
				}
			}
			stillgfx(342, 3424, 3263);
			stillgfx(342, 3423, 3263);
			stillgfx(342, 3422, 3263);
			stillgfx(342, 3424, 3264);
			stillgfx(342, 3423, 3264);
			stillgfx(342, 3422, 3264);
			stillgfx(342, 3424, 3265);
			stillgfx(342, 3423, 3265);
			stillgfx(342, 3422, 3265);
			portalTimer = 60;
	}

and find

	public boolean process() {		// is being called regularily every 500ms

and add this in there

		if(portalTimer == 0){
			portal();				
		}
		portalTimer -= 1;

Read full topic
